intro.text: You awake to a sharp pain on the back of your head.
You look around and realize that you're laying down on cold earth, with cave walls trapping you in.
As you try to get up, your memories start to reveal themselves again, their momentary absence was a result of you being dropped by
that crazy man who pushed you down in this underground cave.
You recall how he spoke of his desire to make a real-life survival game and how you were the chosen unfortunately as the main character.
You get up and dust yourself off and you are met by a Ghost...
